ValidationRule.description: This validation rule validates Case Reason for a cases where status gets changed from In Progress to Vendor Hold
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DateValue(CreatedDate) > Date(2022, 08,02 ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support', ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status) , 'In Progress') , ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Vendor Hold'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Case_Reason__c, '') ) )
